description:
Compact leg warmers make a welcome layer for cool and cold weather cycling throughout the year. Stow them in your pocket when the day warms up. Motion-friendly stretch fabric is brushed on the inside for warmth and comfort.

  • Made of nylon, polyester, and spandex
  • Slightly articulated knee
  • Flat-locked seams
  • Silicone grippers to keep them in place
  • Ankle zippers make them easy to slide on and off
  • Reflective MEC logo and zipper trim for visibility
  • XS leg warmers measure 33cm around the circumference at upper thigh and 60 cm long at center front; Small measures 36cm at upper thigh, 63.5cm long; Medium measures 39cm at upper thigh, 67cm long; Large measures 42.5cm at upper thigh, 69cm long; XL measures 46cm at upper thigh, 70cm long
name: MEC Calefaction Leg Warmers - Unisex
